participant_abstract.sent: The physical appearance and functionality were discussed and agreed upon.
Each person's task in preparation for the next meeting was handed out.
Ideas were discussed such as the physical material that the remote control should be made from and whether numbered buttons should be used or not.

participant_actions.sent: Interface person and industrial person will work together to create a prototype of the physical product.
The marketing person will decide how the next stage of evaluating the product will be conducted.
The manager has to decide which person will have the greater influence at this stage.

There would be no buttons but the changing of channels will be menu driven.
It was decided that there would be an underlying frame to the remot.
It was also decided that the remote would be composed of "off the shelf" components.

It was hope that bulked buying would reduce the cost It was decided that the language for the menu for the remote should be configurable so that this remote could be used internationally... this widens the potential market.
